entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 10:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -24.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -28.4°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
